title: The Dark Side of an Engagement - Novel Updates
tags: European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Magic   Wizards
author: Dahlia in Winter   한겨울의달리아
description:
“I promise I will protect you,” 
Tessia Chloris, the forbidden jade of the empire called the Blood Fairy of the battlefield. 

“You’ll surely love me one day, Princess.” 

Romantic genius wizard, Luwenhart Trianavan. 
Two people who had no contacts signs an engagement by their own needs! 
She was definitely just an excuse for her to dream. 

“I’ll take care of you, Luwenhart!” 

Who is the one who fell into the trap of true love? 


A game of Loco by two unpredictable people!>
